verses.name: Revelation 2:24
verses.text: But unto you I say, and unto the rest in Thyatira, as many as have not this doctrine, and which have not known the depths of Satan, as they speak; I will put upon you none other burden.

verses.name: Revelation 2:25
verses.text: But that which ye have already hold fast till I come.

verses.name: Revelation 2:26
verses.text: And he that overcometh, and keepeth my works unto the end, to him will I give power over the nations:

verses.name: Revelation 2:27
verses.text: And he shall rule them with a rod of iron; as the vessels of a potter shall they be broken to shivers: even as I received of my Father.
